sentences.en: “Full, unabashed, total irradiation of a neonate,” Dr. Sclafani said, adding, “This poor, defenseless baby.
sentences.cn: “对初生婴儿过量的毫不在乎的辐射，”Sclafani医生说，又接着说，“这些可怜的毫无防护能力的婴儿。”

sentences.en: Central lines allow the easy administration of fluids and medication through the navel, and the neonate can receive necessary antibiotics through blood vessels in the arm.
sentences.cn: 中间管线经肚脐向新生儿输送流质和药物，新生儿通过手臂上的血管接受必要的抗生素治疗。

sentences.en: Conclusion : Utilized the dialectical philosophy thought to instruct neonate HIE treating could obtain good curative effect.
sentences.cn: 运用辩证哲学思维指导治疗新生儿HIE能取得较好疗效.

sentences.en: Hemolytic icterus occurs in the neonate of the horse and swine.
sentences.cn: 溶血性黄疸发生于马和猪的初生幼畜.

sentences.en: Hypoxic ischemic encephalopathy ( HIE ) is the most common disease in neonate during the perinatal period.
sentences.cn: 新生儿缺氧缺血性脑病 ( HIE ) 是围产期新生儿的最常见疾病.

sentences.en: It is still in the primary stage of the penumbra study in neonate with HIE.
sentences.cn: 对于新生儿HIE中半暗带的研究,现还处于初级阶段.

sentences.en: Objective : to explore the situation of hospital - acquired infections in neonate and the preventive nursing strategies.
sentences.cn: 目的 了解新生儿医院感染的情况,加强预防措施.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the imaging features of adrenal hemorrhage neonate.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨新生儿肾上腺出血的影像学特征.

sentences.en: Objective Exploratory investigation of normal value of the neonate myocardial enzymes.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨新生儿心肌酶的正常值.

sentences.en: Objective To discuss the relationship between neonate asphyxia and serum CK - MB changes.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨新生儿窒息与血清CK-MB的关系.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To explore the effect of growth andand jaundice and sleep by neonate and touching.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨新生儿游泳联合抚触对新生儿的生长发育、黄疸及睡眠的影响.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the diagnosis, treatment and prognosis of gastric teratoma in neonate.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨新生儿胃畸胎瘤的诊断 、 治疗与预后.

sentences.en: Objective To study the clinical value of CT diagnosis hypoxic ischemic encephalopathy ( HIE ) in neonate.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨CT诊断新生儿缺氧缺血性脑病 ( HIE ) 与临床症状的关系.

sentences.en: Objective To study the role of thyroid function in neonate with septicemia.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨新生儿败血症时甲状腺功能的变化及意义.

sentences.en: Often parents will bring their neonate to the ED with concerns about the umbilical cord and it is just a simple granuloma or normal detachment. But is it omphalitis???
sentences.cn: 家长往往会带新生儿因担忧脐带到ED，它通常只是一个简单的肉芽肿或正常脱落。但它会是脐带炎吗？？？

sentences.en: Repeated courses of antenatal steroids do not cause important hypothalamic - pituitary - adrenal axis suppression in the neonate.
sentences.cn: 重复类固醇激素疗程并不引起新生儿重要的下丘脑 - 垂体 - 肾上腺轴的抑制.

sentences.en: The monitoring system for neonate's brain damnification has noninvasive, multiparameter, and continuous features.
sentences.cn: 本文设计的新生儿脑损伤监护系统具有无创 、 多参数和连续监护的特点.

sentences.en: There were no significant differences in postpartum hemorrhage, neonate Apgar score et al ( P & lt ; 0.05 ).
sentences.cn: 两组在产后出血及新生儿Apgar评分等方面差异无显著性 ( P >0.05 ).

trans.tran_en: a newborn child, esp in the first week of life and up to four weeks old
